description: The Coastal Long Sleeve is a must-have piece of sun-protection. It is a practical and comfortable layer that keeps you protected from the sun. Made from REPREVE® recycled lycra, the Coastal sun top has a sun protection factor of UPF 50+. It is constructed with flat stitched seams to prevent chafing, and it is quick-dry to keep you comfortable all day long. Designed to have a relaxed fit, the Coastal sun top is the ultimate layer to keep you happy while surfing at the beach or paddling on the lake on a hot summer day.
name: Level Six Coastal LS Top - Mens
